channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trash and tension mount in Philadelphia on Day 8 of workers strike, while some seek pop-up haulers
item.description: Philadelphia faces mounting trash and tension as a strike by many of the city’s blue-collar workers enters its eighth day.

item.title: Noem says first responders in Texas ‘still looking for a lot of little girls’ missing after flood
Authorities deflect questions about weather monitoring during deadly Texas floods
